full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30481) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30481 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 14 Jul 2025, 17:05 GMT+10 Thanks, Joel. We can use the Lite plan on this site and webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au As for the other sites, can we also clean up the emails? Here is the updated list:
  • cbddental.com.au - webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au, wordpress@combinate.me
  • nationaldentalspecialists.com.au - kyle.fraser@nationaldentalcare.com.au, wendy.tsang@nationaldentalcare.com.au
  • dentalclinicsydney.com.au - candy.ko@nationaldentalcare.com.au, kyle.fraser@nationaldentalcare.com.au, marketing@nationaldentalcare.com.au, Paige.Sanderson@nationaldentalcare.com.au, lachlan.gilmour@surfpacific.com.au
  • bluehousedental.com.au - info@bluehousedental.com.au, webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au
  • commercialroaddentalsurgery.com.au - digital@nationaldentalcare.com.au, matthew.nakone@outlook.com
  • rawsondental.com.au - webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au, virang@pmgdigital.com.au, snehal@pmgdigital.com.au
Can we remove support@wolfiq.com.au from the website lists? Is it a requirement from your end to add your support email to the websites? Let us know, thanks. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 14 Jul 2025, 15:55 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Sure, here is the list of Admin Users per site. I've bolded and underlined the default login we typically use for each one nationaldentalspecialists.com.au - stuart@cbo.me, kyle.fraser@nationaldentalcare.com.au, support@wolfiq.com.au, wendy.tsang@nationaldentalcare.com.aucbddental.com.au - webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au, wordpress@combinate.medentalclinicsydney.com.au - candy.ko@nationaldentalcare.com.au, marketing@cbo.me, kyle.fraser@nationaldentalcare.com.au, marketing@nationaldentalcare.com.au, Paige.Sanderson@nationaldentalcare.com.au, support@wolfiq.com.au, lachlan.gilmour@surfpacific.com.aubluehousedental.com.au - info@bluehousedental.com.au, webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au, support@wolfiq.com.aucommercialroaddentalsurgery.com.au - digital@nationaldentalcare.com.au, matthew.nakone@outlook.comrawsondental.com.au - webmaster@nationaldentalcare.com.au, virang@pmgdigital.com.au, snehal@pmgdigital.com.aurodwills.com.au - not on our server, might be good to setup a redirect thompsonroaddental.com.au - redirecting to https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/thompson-road Thanks, Joel Maligalig support@wolfiq.com.au Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star Google reviews ✔ Launch landing pages for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run digital health checks on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with website heatmaps Just reply to this email with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services). About your Care Plan • Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month. • Lite Plans - 15 minutes / Pro Plans - 120 minutes / Expert Plans - 300 minutes. • Additional is billed at $149/hr (inc GST) at the end of year month. • Anything else we can help with? Start a new email-it helps us move faster and serve you better. _____________________________
